about_the_game:
Eerily beautiful music from Vagrus - The Riven Realms by the amazing Humming Composer.



A significant share of the proceeds of this OST goes to the composer, so if you like the music of Vagrus, this is a great way to support the one who created it.

Thank you,
The Lost Pilgrims Team & The Humming Composer
